subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] I dont think name calling is aceptible
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
Well, it's his group (he doesn't own it now but he started it) and he's the
one who invented the box and builds them and supplies us with all the info
on them. His name is Frank Sumption.

Those of us who have been around here half of forever are used to him and
aren't offended.

Zack

On Mon, Aug 17, 2009 at 6:48 PM, jba5656 <jba5656@...> wrote:

>
>

> John
